meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Roger Craig Ken Jennings Brad Rutter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6840.

div.div: Battle of the Decades final game 2.

td.p: Roger Craig, a data scientist from Brooklyn, New York (subtotal of $0)
Ken Jennings, a writer from Seattle, Washington (subtotal of $7,000)
Brad Rutter, an actor and producer from Hollywood, California (subtotal of $10,000)

tr.td: THE COSTUME DESIGNS OF WILLIAM IVEY LONG
TRAVEL & TOURISM
ORGANIZATION
AFRICAN-AMERICAN HISTORY
1 LETTER DIFFERENT
(Alex: Each correct response will be 2 words, different by only one letter.)
OSCAR-WINNING SONGS

...

')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
